basicInfo.name: Bi Dam
basicInfo.flavor: One fateful day, Bi Dam single-handedly thwarted a band of marauding bandits threatening the village, capturing their leader in the process. His bravery and skill earned him the title of leader of the Hwarang.

Normal Attack.desc:
2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 55% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Bleed chance becomes 40%.

Skill 1.name: Mega Arrow
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 72% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 55% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Bleed chance becomes 60%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Reduces Cooldown: To 55s.
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict Bleed on a target inflicted with [Bleed]. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)].

Skill 2.name: Explosive Arrows
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 175% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Detonates Bleed stacks at 120% of their power. [Max 3 Stack(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 205% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Damage: Bleed Explosion power becomes 150%.

Passive.name: Hwarang Blood
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Boost upon using any attack 3 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Heals HP equal to 50% of the caster's Physical Attack upon using any attack 3 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Damage Boost to 35%.
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 55% of Physical Attack.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Xiao Qiao, Jupy, Lee Jung, members of Hwarang, setting an example, peace
profile.story: One fateful day, Bi Dam single-handedly thwarted a band of marauding bandits threatening the village, capturing their leader in the process. His bravery and skill earned him the title of leader of the Hwarang.

basicInfo.name: Bi Dam
basicInfo.flavor: Born into a family of famous warriors, Bi Dam found his talent in archery, and at a young age he joined a young group of warriors called the Hwarang.

2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 30% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect

 - Each attack has a 55% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.

3 Enemies

 - Detonates Bleed stacks at 120% of their power. [Max 3 Stack(s)]

profile.story: Born into a family of famous warriors, Bi Dam found his talent in archery, and at a young age he joined a young group of warriors called the Hwarang.

basicInfo.name: Bi Dam
basicInfo.flavor: While bravely defending his village from bandits, Bi Dam was kidnapped and later rescued by Lee Jung. Since then, he has trained rigorously and gained a reputation as a master archer.

Normal Attack.desc:
2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 25% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
